title: Chest for Photographs
artistDisplayName:
Designed by Josef Hoffmann
Austrian, born Moravia (now Czech Republic) 1870-1956
Made by W. Müller
Vienna, active early 20th century
medium: Wood with palisander and maple veneers, nickel silver
